title: Will all schools reopen this August 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, most probably all schools will reopen in August 2020 and some might even delay for September if any further issues. But, no one needs to worry about the studies as many schools have opted for online video calling platforms for the continuity. This is a great way to stay connected with the students and provide uninterrupted education. Tejasvi Vidyaranya, Best CBSE School in Hyderabad are also open for the new admissions which is great. Schools are also evolving using Technology.

In the uk, primary schools have already been open for some time. As for secondary schools and upper education the dates are starting to form. For me, as a secondary student, I will be going back to school early mid September and so will the rest of my school. This will be the same for most secondary schools in the uk. Of course if you want to know more you can check the government websites for certain information.
